title: Is Trump Considering Pardoning Capitol Riot Extremists?
subtitle: The Trump administration's acting pardon attorney supposedly made the announcement in a Parler post.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: Acting Pardon Attorney Rosalind Sargent-Burns wrote in a Parler post that U.S. President Donald Trump was considering pardoning his supporters who faced criminal charges in the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol insurrection.
